Sequoia See the South Australia you never knew existed! Forget Bordeaux - South Australia has its own world-class food and wine scene for you to sample (and it's a lot closer to home). Base yourself at the 14-suite, adults-only luxury lodge ensconced in nature and sitting atop of Adelaide's Mount Lofty, affectionately known as Koala Mountain. Sequoia Lodge's 30 acre nature setting blends into the Adelaide Hills Botanic Gardens on one side of the peak and thousands of acres of national park on the other, all only 20 minutes from the Adelaide CBD. Every suite brings the outside in with local materials in earthy tones, uninterrupted views over the valley, and wallabies roaming outside your balcony. Sequoia Lodge only accommodates guests over 18 years of age. Sequoia Suite (3 Nights) Travel Dates: 9 Nov - 18 Dec 25, 11 Jan - 22 Jan 26, 26 Jan - 5 Mar 26 & 9 Mar - 31 Mar 26 Twin per person fr $3,630 Includes 3 nights at Sequoia -Full breakfast daily - Complimentary mini-bar with local artisan produce, beers, soft drinks and juices - Complimentary on-site experiences and activities such as: Lodge welcome each evening on the valley rim, Swimming in the artesian spring-fed hot pools & infinity pool, Guided Nature walk along the Heysen Trail Star Gazing, from dusk until late from the private telescope, Yoga experience, South Australian Cheese Discovery experience.
